issue.title: What is the structure of the final?

content.html:
@aricstewart, there is some information in the first weekly FAQ from NineSigma. In the answer to Q5 they say:

"You can run code on the Field Computer (robot computer), and communicate with an OCU. It’s up to you to decide what code gets run where."

I think the expectation is that our control will be semi-autonomous in that we can have any level of interaction, but we will need to automate some tasks to have any hope of finishing each task within the allotted time.
